mapper.select: select id, pwd, name, email, birth, mobile, reg_date from user where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, pwd, name, email, birth, mobile) values (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{mobile})
mapper.update: update user set pwd = #{pwd}, email = #{email}, birth = #{birth}, mobile = #{mobile} where id = #{id}
